EXP-UNTYPED-ENVIRONMENT

MODULE EXP-UNTYPED-ENVIRONMENT-SYNTAX

SYNTAX Exp ::= ( Exp )
| if Exp then Exp else Exp [ strict(1) ]
| Exp Exp [ strict ]
| mu Id . Exp
| lambda Id . Exp
| let Id = Exp in Exp
| letrec Id Id = Exp in Exp
| Int
| Bool
| Id
| Exp + Exp [ strict ]
| Exp - Exp [ strict ]
| Exp * Exp [ strict ]
| Exp / Exp [ strict ]
| Exp % Exp [ strict ]
| - Exp [ strict ]
| Exp < Exp [ strict ]
| Exp <= Exp [ strict ]
| Exp > Exp [ strict ]
| Exp >= Exp [ strict ]
| Exp == Exp [ strict ]
| Exp != Exp [ strict ]
| Exp and Exp [ strict ]
| Exp or Exp [ strict ]
| not Exp [ strict ]

RULE
let X = E in E'
lambda X . E' E
[ macro, anywhere ]

RULE
letrec F X = E in E'
let F = mu F . lambda X . E in E'
[ macro, anywhere ]

END MODULE

MODULE EXP-UNTYPED-ENVIRONMENT

SYNTAX Val ::= Int
| Bool

SYNTAX Exp ::= Val

SYNTAX KResult ::= Val

CONFIGURATION :
T

k

$PGM
env

  ·  
store

  ·  
nextLoc

0
result

  ·  

RULE
T

k

V
result

V

RULE
k

X
E
env

X ↦ L
store

L ↦ E

RULE
I1 + I2
I1 +Int I2

RULE
I1 - I2
I1 -Int I2

RULE
I1 * I2
I1 *Int I2

RULE
I1 / I2
I1 /Int I2
when I2 =/=Int 0

RULE
I1 % I2
I1 %Int I2
when I2 =/=Int 0

RULE
- I
0 -Int I

RULE
I1 < I2
I1 <Int I2

RULE
I1 <= I2
I1 <=Int I2

RULE
I1 > I2
I1 >Int I2

RULE
I1 >= I2
I1 >=Int I2

RULE
V1 == V2
V1 ==K V2

RULE
V1 != V2
V1 =/=K V2

RULE
T1 and T2
T1 andBool T2

RULE
T1 or T2
T1 orBool T2

RULE
not T
notBool T

RULE
if true then E else _
E

RULE
if false then _ else E
E

SYNTAX Val ::= closure-lambda ( Map , Id , Exp )

RULE
k

lambda X . E
closure-lambda ( ρ , X , E )
env

ρ

RULE
k

closure-lambda ( ρ , X , E ) V
E ↝ env ( ρ' )
env

ρ'
ρ [ L / X ]
store

  ·  
L ↦ V
nextLoc

L
L +Int 1

SYNTAX K ::= env ( Map )

RULE
k

V ↝
env ( ρ )
  ·  
env

_
ρ
[ structural ]

RULE
env ( _ )
  ·  
↝ env ( _ )
[ structural ]

SYNTAX Exp ::= closure-mu ( Map , Exp )

RULE
k

mu X . E
closure-mu ( ρ [ L / X ] , E )
env

ρ
store

  ·  
L ↦ closure-mu ( ρ [ L / X ] , E )
nextLoc

L
L +Int 1

RULE
k

closure-mu ( ρ , E )
E ↝ env ( ρ' )
env

ρ'
ρ

END MODULE
